title: Mohammad-Reza Ashtiani Araghi
text:
Mohammad Reza Ashtiani Araghi () is an Iranian <a href="Shia%20clergy">Shia cleric</a> and <a href="Iranian%20Principlists">conservative</a> politician who represented <a href="Qom%20%28electoral%20district%29">Qom</a> in the <a href="Iranian%20Parliament">Iranian Parliament</a> from 2004 to 2016.
He is among the authors of "<a href="Tafsir%20Nemooneh">Tafsir Nemooneh</a>".
